member.summary: Defines the configuration properties available for the current object.

member.summary: This is a configuration class that defines settings for the DEA component.

member.summary: Base Directory configuration property.

member.summary: Local route configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyFilerPort
member.summary: Filer port configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyHeartBeatInterval
member.summary: Heart beat interval configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyMessageBus
member.summary: Message bus configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyMultiTenant
member.summary: Muti-tenant configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyMaxMemory
member.summary: Maximum memory configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertySecure
member.summary: "Is secure" configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyEnforceUsageLimit
member.summary: Enforec usage limit configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyDisableDirCleanup
member.summary: Disable directory cleanup configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyForceHttpSharing
member.summary: Force http sharing configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.propertyRuntimes
member.summary: Runtimes configuration property.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.properties
member.summary: Configuration properties collection.

member.name: M:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the DEAElement class.

member.name: M:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the object is read-only.
member.returns: true if the object is read-only; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.BaseDir
member.summary: Gets or sets the base directory where all applications are staged and hosted

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.LocalRoute
member.summary: Gets or sets the local route. The local route is the IP address of a well known server on your network, used to choose the right ip address (think of hosts that have multiple nicks and IP addresses assigned to them) of the host running the DEA. A default value of null should work in most cases.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.FilerPort
member.summary: Gets or sets the port for accessing the files of running applications.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.HeartbeatInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval to send heartbeat messages to the message bus, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.MessageBus
member.summary: Gets or sets the NATS message bus URI.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.Multitenant
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether more than one application is allowed to run per DEA.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.MaxMemory
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated to this DEA. In a multi tenant setup, this memory is divided amongst all applications managed by this DEA.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.Secure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the environment for running applications in a multi tenant setup is secure or not.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.EnforceUsageLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ulimit-based resource isolation in a multi tenant setup is provided or not.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.DisableDirCleanup
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether disabling the cleanup of droplet instances after stopping them is activated or not.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.ForceHttpSharing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the droplets are to be downloaded over http even when there is a shared directory containing the droplet or not.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.Runtimes
member.summary: Gets the runtimes configuration for the dea.

member.name: P:Uhuru.Configuration.DEA.DEAElement.Properties
member.summary: Overrides the Properties collection and returns our custom one.
